activities: Salesfusion provides a SaaS-based marketing automation software application that is used by businesses within the EU/EEA for online marketing purposes. This includes email marketing, online marketing, CRM and other related activities. Salesfusion receives and stores information for companies who use the software in our primary EU datacenter which is hosted by Amazon Web Services and located in Ireland.
eucountries: Belgium, Finland, France, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer name, email, phone number, address, marketing activity
